# airbyte_workspace (Data Source)

Workspace DataSource

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "airbyte_workspace" "my_workspace" {
  workspace_id = "...my_workspace_id..."
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `workspace_id` (String)

### Read-Only

- `data_residency` (String) must be one of ["auto", "us", "eu"]
- `name` (String)
